snippet: World number one Serena Williams pulled out of the mixed teams Hopman Cup event due to a knee injury on Wednesday, less than two weeks before the start of the Australian Open....
lead_paragraph: World number one Serena Williams pulled out of the mixed teams Hopman Cup event due to a knee injury on Wednesday, less than two weeks before the start of the Australian Open.

headline.print_headline: Knee Injury Forces Serena to Withdraw From Hopman Cup
headline.main: Knee Injury Forces Serena to Withdraw From Hopman Cup
